about_the_game:
The Last Maestro™ is a gesture-controlled virtual reality (VR) connector between your mind and body. The Maestro (that's you!) merges music, movement, and visuals to provide an emotionally compelling & healing therapeutic experience.

The Last Maestro™ was created to help calm the mind, re-form new neuro-pathways, and enable players to find peace and joy via the connection with art and music and discovery of beauty and awe. Stressed? Do you need to reconnect with your joy? Immerse yourself in gorgeous classical music and conduct your day. The Last Maestro will help you calm your mind and reset your mood.

Maestros enter a virtual environment and conduct music. As the timing to the music and movement are synchronized, the world is revealed and becomes brighter. The Maestro continues to conduct the piece through its conclusion, and should notice a different mental state at the last wave of the virtual baton.

This version of The Last Maestro is an early-access version. It contains two locations to explore while you conduct. The early-access version does *not* include any subscription data or experiences, and is available for a limited time.

Future versions of The Last Maestro will be subscription-based with quarterly bundles available.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, HTC Vive Focus 3, HTC Vive Focus Vision, HTC Vive Pro 2, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest Pro, Pico 4

short_description: Reset your mind, nurture your heart, reconnect with your soul. Play "The Last Maestro" and immerse yourself in gorgeous classical music paired with beautiful animated experiences. Release your stress, calm your anxiety, rediscover your childlike awe and wonder.
